name: Designers Project Styleguide
description:
A simple and lightweight styleguide perfect to kickstart any digital project. Just update the colours, type style and grid to your liking. I made this to supercharge my own projects and quickly get a bunch of styles to begin working.

---

🔡 Heading and paragraph styles
🎨 Set of brand colours as well as basic greys and messaging colours
📐 8px grid setup for desktop, tablet and mobile breakpoints

---

⚡️ Updated file layout and type styles [24 Aug 2020]
